dialog-demoend-cutscene-lasttime1.name: Beatrice
messages: Oh, no! This is just like last time!

dialog-demoend-cutscene-middle2.name: %Jackob%
messages:
I was afraid the Big Bad would notice what
you were doing.

dialog-demoend-cutscene-middle3a.name: %Alfonso%
messages:
You think the Big Bad somehow knows that
someone here has been using Ring Zero?

dialog-demoend-cutscene-middle3b.name: %Marta%
messages:
But it's been so long since the Big Bad
was seen at all! You think he might still
be out there, somewhere?

dialog-demoend-cutscene-middle3c.name: %Jackob%
messages: What else does this earthquake mean?

dialog-demoend-cutscene-middle4.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
But I can't fight the Big Bad! What am I
supposed to do?

dialog-demoend-cutscene-middle5.name: %Alfonso%
messages: I suppose... I suppose we must consider....

dialog-demoend-cutscene-end1.name: %Alfonso%
messages:
%PLAYER%, you must collect the
artifacts of power.

Just outside the town are three dungeons,
and at the end of each there is one
magical artifact.

That ring will not be enough to defeat
the Big Bad, but with those three
artifacts....

dialog-demoend-cutscene-end1.name: %Jackob%
messages: You must go and retrieve them!

dialog-demoend-cutscene-end-demo1.name: %Jackob%
messages: This has been DC801's badge game for 2020!

Thank you for playing, and we hope you'll
play the rest of the game next year!

dialog-demoend-cutscene-end-demo1.name: %Jackob%
messages:
As a reward for completing the demo, I'll
tell you how to unlock debug mode.

dialog-demoend-cutscene-end-demo2.name: %Jackob%
messages:
Press XOR and MEM0 at the same time --
that's the top button on each side of the
screen -- and....
